Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided to prove that Sri Lanka restaurant workers wash crockery in dirty water.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that the video shows Sri Lanka restaurant workers washing crockery in dirty water, without verifying the authenticity of the video.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the video, as it has been confirmed to be from an Indian restaurant in Malaysia, not Sri Lanka.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video is not from Sri Lanka but from Malaysia.
Understate: The claim may understate the impact of the video, as it led to the closure of the restaurant in Malaysia due to hygiene concerns.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration in the claim.
